on reading compounds: 仏像【ブツゾウ】statue of Buddha, image of Buddha, Buddhist statue, Buddhist image
石仏【セキブツ】stone Buddhist image, unemotional person, taciturn person
成仏【ジョウブツ】entering Nirvana, becoming a Buddha, going to heaven, resting in peace, dying (peacefully)
米仏【ベイフツ】America and France, American-French
kun reading compounds: 仏【ほとけ】Buddha, merciful person, Buddhist image, the dead, dead person, spirit of the dead
神仏【しんぶつ】gods and Buddha, Shinto and Buddhism
笑い仏【わらいほとけ】smiling Buddha (statue), laughing Buddha
